column1: #Text=Bolin says : " Okay , I say we go up and around the mountains -- -- and sneak into Zaofu from the rear . "
#Text=Varrick says : " We 're not going to Zaofu , that place is doomed !
#Text=No , nonono , we got ta help here .
#Text=" Varrick says : " We 'll be helping by warning the world about Kuvira 's potential superweapon !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Well , that 's helping , but it 's a completely different type of helping .
#Text=" Varrick says : " That 's not the flamethrower !
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " You did , sir !
#Text=" Varrick says : " Less lecturing , more saving my life !
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " Sir , you 're making this very difficult .
